content.prompt:
Expressions with constants from Memphis.
(1-29) Casting values, using Scanner (change making program, pet store checkout) PetStore.java

Program that demonstrates using Scanner to read user input -- simulates checkout from an online pet store.

uses.context_name: Java: INFSCI 0017 | CSEdPad test course (CS1 Memphis) > Preliminary topics
